ATTLEBORO - A local man is facing charges that he assaulted and raped an underage girl 10 years ago .
, 51 , of 48 Birch St. , Attleboro , was arraigned Friday in Attleboro District Court on a warrant charging him with indecent assault and battery on a child under 14 and rape of a child with force .
Judge Daniel O'Shea set bail at $ 1,500 .
